problem_text: In \triangle P Q R, S T \parallel R Q. If P S = 12.5, S R = 5, and P T = 15, find T Q.
compact_text: In \triangle PQR, ST \parallel RQ. If PS = 12.5, SR = 5, and PT = 15, find TQ.
annotat_text: In $\triangle PQR$, $\overline{ST} \| \overline{R Q}$ . If  $PS=12.5$, $SR=5$, and $PT=15$, find $TQ$.
